summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to financing improvements to the Fremont Bridge; authorizing the Director of Transportation to execute a Public Works Trust Fund Loan Agreement with the Washington State Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development for grating replacement and seismic improvements on the Fremont Bridge; authorizing the acceptance of the Public Works Trust Fund proceeds and the incurring of indebtedness; and making a reimbursable appropriation; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
